title: Fauvel (Alberto). And
body: Catalog of the Beetles of the Islands of Madeira, Porto Santo, and Desertas; Catalog of the Beetles of the Selvages Islands; and Arachnids collected on the Island of Madeira in 1896. The first two works were published in the Revue d'Entomologie, 1897; the last one in the Bulletin de la Societe Entomologique de France, 1897.

1896: Year in which the Arachnids were collected on the Island of Madeira
